description:
Introducing the all new Bodhi multifunctional hybrid short featuring a quick dry, wrinkle resistant 4-way stretch material made from a polyester blend derived partially from discarded water bottles.

From the links to downtown for drinks and everywhere in between, the Bodhi short offers ultimate comfort, fit and style all in one package. You asked. They delivered. Designed for life and everything it has to offer.
name: 2Undr Bodhi Shorts - Solid - Mens
